NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_TITLE: Welcome to the Practically Me App
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The Practically Me App lets you carry your photo album wherever you go! Simply log in and you will have secure access your photos.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Navigate through the app with tabs, or pull out the menu to switch users.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: With the Practically Me app, you can contact us or book appointments instantly, from anywhere!
